/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by towering buildings and lush green trees, creating a harmonious blend of urban and natural elements. The sky overhead is overcast, casting a soft, diffused light over the scene. Cars and buses traverse the street, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static cityscape. The colors in the image are predominantly gray and green, reflecting the urban environment and the natural hues of the trees.
